DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the application of soluble beta-glucan (SBG) onto diabetic foot ulcers improves the healing of the ulcers.
DOC.brief_title: Soluble Beta-glucan (SBG) as Treatment for Diabetic Foot Ulcers
